scripts.build-all: yarn run build-ui && yarn run build-css
scripts.clean: rm -rf output bower_components node_modules && cd css && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.watch-ui: pulp -w --then 'yarn run build-css' build -I ui-guide --to dist/example.js
scripts.tag-release: func() { yarn version --new-version $1 && git commit -am 'Bumping version to: $1' && git push && git tag -a v$1; }; func
